text: Demi Lovato Plastic Surgery rumors persist in 2018. We explore three areas that deserve closer looks. See the before and after photos to make up your own mind! Demi Lovato Plastic Surgery History Demi Lovato first came into the lime light as a cute Disney princess staring in cute movies such as The Princess Protection Program ( 2009 ), Camp Rock ( 2008 ) among many others. Demi has also been a judge on the X Factor ( 2012, 2013 ). She co - headlined a concert, Future Now Tour in 2016 with Nick Jonas. She even transformed from a Disney princess to a punk princess by shaving a side of her head and been spotted rocking black leather outfits. In 2017, she released a YouTube documentary about herself called Demi Lovato : Simply Complicated.
